texts.EnableMfaSuccess: Two-factor authentication has been enabled successfully.
texts.DisableMfaSuccess: Two-factor authentication has been disabled successfully.
texts.AreYouSure: Are you sure you want to {0}?
texts.UseGoogleAuthenticator: Please use Google or Microsoft Authenticator to scan the QR code below:
texts.UserLockedOutMessage: Your account has been locked due to multiple invalid login attempts. Please wait a while and try again.
texts.UserLogoutOrSessionExpired: You have been logged out or your session has expired.
texts.ResetMfaSuccess: Two-factor authentication has been reset. Please scan the new QR code.
texts.ManualSetupKeyHint: If you canâ€™t scan the QR code, enter this key in your authenticator app.
texts.ResetConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset Two-Factor for {0}?
texts.ResetFailed: Reset failed. Please try again later or check permissions/API.
texts.Setting:TwoFactorAuth:EnforcementEnabled: When enabled, all authenticated users must enable two-factor authentication. Users without MFA will be redirected to the enrollment page (or APIs will return 401 depending on configuration).
